articles.title: Insights from the field: Legatum’s visit to our Advancing Justice Programme in Uganda
articles.metaDescription: The Advancing Justice Programme was established by Legatum to promote dignity and justice in criminal justice systems.

articles.title: Insights from the field: Legatum’s visit to Freedom Fund programmes in Ethiopia
articles.metaDescription: In June 2023, I travelled to Ethiopia with a group of six other Legatum staff members to witness the work of the Freedom Fund’s local partners in action.

articles.title: The Freedom Fund: Systems Change to End Modern-Day Slavery

metaImage.title: Legatum Rise 1 India Nirdesh Atul Loke 035

articles.metaDescription: Why is modern slavery so widespread and pervasive? And what is being done to address it?

articles.title: CEO Mark Stoleson meets The Business of Giving
articles.metaDescription: Mark Stoleson, CEO, discusses Legatum’s approach to philanthropy on radio show and podcast, The Business of Giving.

articles.title: The impact of philanthropic capital in the anti-slavery space
articles.metaDescription: Over the last decade, the Freedom Fund has developed a model of philanthropy that has shown to be highly impactful in the anti-slavery space.

articles.title: Introducing the Freedom Fund's Hotspot Model
articles.metaDescription: This video outlines how the Freedom Fund’s hotspot model is empowering local frontline organisations to end modern slavery
